堫字的基本解释

堫
zōng
栽种。
以此入彼中。
不耕而种。

堫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《廣韻》子紅切，平東，精。］
(1)种植。
(2)引申为插入其中。

堫字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　堫； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页233第28
【廣韻】子紅切【集韻】【韻會】祖叢切，?音椶。【說文】種也。一曰內其中也。一曰不耕而種。或作䎫。　又【廣韻】楚江切【集韻】初江切，?音囪。義同。

堫字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
堫字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
堫
zōng
plant.
Take this into it.
Grow without farming.
堫
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Guangyun" sub-red cut, flat east, fine. ]
(1) Planting.
(2) The extension is inserted into it.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　堫; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 233 28
[Guangyun] Zihongqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Ancestral Congqie, sound 椶. [Said Wen] Kind of. One of them is within one day. One says planting without plowing. Or do it.　[Guangyun] Chu Jiangqie [Jiyun] Chu Jiangqie,? Sound Chimney. The same meaning.
